body:
Comment 3: 
Hello,

http://golang.org/cl/6307058/

This has been tested by cross compiling on darwin/amd64 to linux/arm using

* gcc version 4.2.1 (Based on Apple Inc. build 5658) (LLVM build 2336.1.00)
* clang version 3.1 (branches/release_31)

As well as on linux/arm using

* gcc version 4.6.3 (Ubuntu/Linaro 4.6.3-1ubuntu5) 
* Ubuntu clang version 3.0-6ubuntu3 (tags/RELEASE_30/final) (based on LLVM 3.0)
* Debian clang version 3.1-4 (branches/release_31) (based on LLVM 3.1) 

Cheers

Dave
_Labels changed: added **priority-soon**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @davecheney._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
